additionalfeatures: Approx. 200 shots when using alkaline batteries. Approx. 650 shots when using lithium batteries. Approx. 380 shots when using EN-MH2 batteries, 1/4 in. (ISO 1222) Tripod socket
inbuiltflash: Yes, TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
batterytype: Two LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries (supplied), Two FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries (optional), Two EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries (optional)
continuousshots: Up to 3 shots at 1.2 frames per second
shootingmodes: Easy auto, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting
